messages.title: This election is the chance to transform our country.
messages.content: Only Labour can stop Boris Johnson’s disastrous Brexit deal. A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party will help Boris Johnson.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit sorted by giving you the final say.
Abolish tuition fees and reintroduce grants and allowances for young people from low and middle income backgrounds.
Kickstart a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high-skilled, high-wage jobs.
Fix the housing crisis with a massive increase in social housing and a New Deal for private renters and first-time buyers.
Immediately introduce a Real Living Wage of £10 an hour for everyone in work over 16.
Reverse Tory tax giveaways to the super rich.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can stop Boris Johnson’s disastrous Brexit deal. A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party will help Boris Johnson.
